AT.name: Another World - 20th Anniversary Edition
AT.description: Another World™ ist auch unter dem Namen Out Of This World™ bekannt und wurde seit seiner Veröffentlichung 1991 auf mehr als einem Dutzend Plattformen veröffentlicht. Kritiker und anspruchsvolle Spieler lobten das Spiel in höchsten Tönen wegen seiner filmischen Grafik- und Soundeffekte sowie der geschnittenen Szenen. EIN SPANNENDES ABENTEUER MIT EINZIGARTIGER STORY Mit der vollkommen neuen Art, eine Geschichte flüssig und filmisch zu erzählen, baut Another World™ eine Brücke zwischen Film und Abenteuerspiel. Aufgrund eines Fehlers während eines atomaren Experiments wirst du durch Raum und Zeit geschleudert und musst nun außerirdische Monster bezwingen und austricksen und tödlichen Erdbeben aus dem Weg gehen, um in dieser außerirdischen Landschaft zu überleben, die von nun an dein Zuhause ist. Nur mit Logik und Talent wirst du es schaffen die lauernden tödlichen Hindernisse zu bewälitgen. ZUM 20. GEBURTSTAG ERSCHEINT EINE SONDEREDITION SPEZIELL FÜR KONSOLE * Ein remastered Spiel: dank einer gemeinsamen Anstrengung zwischen dem visionären Schöpfer Eric Chahi-und Entwickler-Martial Hessen Dréville, Another World™ ist zurück auf der Konsole mit High-Definition treu zu den Original-Design-Grafiken. * 3 Schwierigkeitsstufen, Normal (einfacher als die Originalversion), Schwer (wie die die Originalversion) und Sehr schwer (schwieriger als die Originalversion). * Wählen Sie zwischen 100% remastered Sounds / FX, Originalton und Original-CD im Spiel-Soundtrack. * Wechseln Sie zwischen Original / HD-Grafik.

AU.name: Another World - 20th Anniversary Edition
AU.description: Also known as Out Of This World™ and released across more than a dozen platforms since its 1991 debut, Another World™ has attained cult status among critics and sophisticated gamers alike for its cinematic effects in the graphics, sound and cut scenes. AN IMMERSIVE ADVENTURE WITH UNIQUE STORYTELLING Another World™ chronicles the story of Lester Knight Chaykin a young scientist hurtled through space and time by a nuclear experiment that goes wrong. In an alien and inhospitable world, you will have to dodge, outwit, and overcome the host of alien monsters, while surviving an environment as deadly as your enemies. Only a perfect blend of logic and skill will get you past the deadly obstacles that lie in wait. 20TH ANNIVERSARY EDITION ESPECIALLY DESIGNED FOR CONSOLE * Remastered presentation: a joint effort between visionary game-designer Eric Chahi and developer Martial Hesse Dreville, Another World is back in its 20th Anniversary Edition with High Definition graphics faithful to the original design. * 3 difficulty modes, Normal (easier than original game), Difficult (Equal to original game) and Hardcore (more difficult than original game). * Choose between 100% remastered Sounds/FX, Original Sound and Original CD in-game soundtrack. * Switch between Original/HD graphics.

BG.name: Another World - 20th Anniversary Edition
BG.description: Also known as Out Of This World™ and released across more than a dozen platforms since its 1991 debut, Another World™ has attained cult status among critics and sophisticated gamers alike for its cinematic effects in the graphics, sound and cut scenes. AN IMMERSIVE ADVENTURE WITH UNIQUE STORYTELLING Another World™ chronicles the story of Lester Knight Chaykin a young scientist hurtled through space and time by a nuclear experiment that goes wrong. In an alien and inhospitable world, you will have to dodge, outwit, and overcome the host of alien monsters, while surviving an environment as deadly as your enemies. BE.name: Another World - 20th Anniversary Edition
BE.description: Publié sur plus d’une douzaine de plateformes depuis ses débuts en 1991, Another World™ a acquis le statut d’oeuvre culte auprès des critiques comme des gamers pour son gameplay innovant et sa mise en scène cinématographique avant-gardiste. UNE AVENTURE IMMERSIVE ET UNIQUE Il avait à peine une chance sur un million pour qu’un tel accident se produise. Quant à ses conséquences, nul ne pouvait les prévoir et certainement pas Lester Knight Chaykin, qui se trouve maintenant projeté dans un autre monde. Un monde où le danger surgira à chaque instant… Un monde peuplé de créatures sauvages contre lesquelles la lutte sera sans merci, où vous ferez la découverte d’une bien étrange civilisation peuplée de créatures humanoïdes auxquelles vous devez échapper. Mais c’est dans cet « autre monde » que vous retrouverez aussi le vrai sens d’une liberté reconquise de haute lutte. Vous apprendrez que l’amitié reste le plus précieux des biens et chaque aube qui se lèvera sera pour vous une nouvelle victoire. EDITION 20e ANNIVERSAIRE SPECIALEMENT READAPTEE POUR CONSOLE * Un jeu remasterisé : grâce à un effort conjoint entre le visionnaire-créateur Eric Chahi et le développeur Martial Hesse-Dreville, Another World est de retour sur console dans sa 20eme Edition Anniversaire avec des graphismes haute définition fidèle à la conception originale. * 3 modes de difficulté, Normal (plus facile que l’original), Difficile (similaire à l’original) and Hardcore (l’expérience ultime, plus dur que l’original). * Choisissez entre la bande son et effets sonores 100% remasterisés, les sons originaux et la bande son CD originale. * Passez des graphismes d’origine aux HD.

EE.description: Also known as Out Of This World™ and released across more than a dozen platforms since its 1991 debut, Another World™ has attained cult status among critics and sophisticated gamers alike for its cinematic effects in the graphics, sound and cut scenes. ES.name: Another World - 20th Anniversary Edition
ES.description: También conocido como Out Of This World™ y lanzado en más de una docena de plataformas desde su debut en 1991, Another World™ ha alcanzado una condición de culto entre la crítica y los jugadores avanzados por sus efectos cinemáticos en los gráficos, el sonido y las escenas de corte. UNA AVENTURA ENVOLVENTE CON UNA HISTORIA ÚNICA Another World™ cubre la brecha entre el cine y los juegos de acción-aventura con un estilo completamente nuevo de narrativa fluida y cinemática. Lanzado al espacio y en el tiempo por un experimento nuclear fallido, deberás eludir, burlar y superar a las huestes de monstruos alienígenas y los terremotos mortales que plagan el territorio extraterrestre al que ahora llamas hogar. Sólo una perfecta combinación de lógica y habilidad te permitirá superar los obstáculos mortales que te esperan. EDICIÓN 20 ANIVERSARIO ESPECIALMENTE DISEÑADA PARA CONSOLA * Un juego remasterizado: gracias a un esfuerzo conjunto entre el visionario creador Eric Chahi y programador Martial Hesse Dréville, Another World™ está de vuelta en la consola con la alta definición fiel a los gráficos originales del diseño. * 3 modos de dificultad: Normal (más fácil que el juego original), Difícil (igual al juego original) y Muy difícil (más difícil que el juego original). * Elija entre la banda sonora y efectos de sonido 100% remasterizados, sonidos originales y CD banda sonora original. * Cambia entre gráficos originales y HD.

IT.name: Another World - 20th Anniversary Edition
IT.description: Noto anche come Out Of This World™ e rilasciato per una dozzina di piattaforme a partire dal suo debutto nel 1991, Another World™ è diventato un "cult" tra i critici come tra i giocatori più sofisticati per gli effetti cinematici della grafica, dell'audio e delle cutscene. UN'AVVENTURA COINVOLGENTE CON UNA STORIA UNICA Another World™ colma il vuoto esistente tra Cinema e giochi Action-Adventure con uno stile completamente nuovo di narrazione fluida e cinematica. Lanciato attraverso lo spazio e il tempo da un esperimento nucleare dagli esiti disastrosi, dovrai sfuggire ad una schiera di mostri alieni, dimostrandoti più furbo e più forte di loro, ed evitando anche i terribili terremoti da cui è flagellato il paesaggio alieno che ormai tu chiami casa. Solo un perfetto mix di logica e abilità ti permetterà di superare i micidiali ostacoli che ti attendono. EDIZIONE PER IL 20° ANNIVERSARIO, APPOSITAMENTE PROGETTATA PER CONSOLE * Un gioco rimasterizzata: uno sforzo congiunto tra visionario game-designer Eric Chahi e sviluppatore Marziale Hesse Dréville, Another World™ è tornato con grafica in alta definizione fedeli al disegno originale. * 3 livelli di difficoltà: Normale (più facile del gioco originale), Difficile (come il gioco originale) e Molto difficile (più difficile del gioco originale). * Scegli tra il 100% rimasterizzata Sounds / FX, suono originale e CD originale console musica. * Possibilità di passare in qualsiasi momento dalla grafica originale a quella in HD.

Mais c’est dans cet « autre monde » que vous retrouverez aussi le vrai sens d’une liberté reconquise de haute lutte. Vous apprendrez que l’amitié reste le plus précieux des biens et chaque aube qui se lèvera sera pour vous une nouvelle victoire. EDITION 20e ANNIVERSAIRE SPECIALEMENT READAPTEE POUR CONSOLE * Un jeu remasterisé : grâce à un effort conjoint entre le visionnaire-créateur Eric Chahi et le développeur Martial Hesse-Dreville, Another World est de retour sur console dans sa 20eme Edition Anniversaire avec des graphismes haute définition fidèle à la conception originale. * 3 modes de difficulté, Normal (plus facile que l’original), Difficile (similaire à l’original) and Hardcore (l’expérience ultime, plus dur que l’original). * Choisissez entre la bande son et effets sonores 100% remasterisés, les sons originaux et la bande son CD originale. * Passez des graphismes d’origine aux HD.

MT.name: Another World - 20th Anniversary Edition
MT.description: Also known as Out Of This World™ and released across more than a dozen platforms since its 1991 debut, Another World™ has attained cult status among critics and sophisticated gamers alike for its cinematic effects in the graphics, sound and cut scenes. AN IMMERSIVE ADVENTURE WITH UNIQUE STORYTELLING Another World™ chronicles the story of Lester Knight Chaykin a young scientist hurtled through space and time by a nuclear experiment that goes wrong. In an alien and inhospitable world, you will have to dodge, outwit, and overcome the host of alien monsters, while surviving an environment as deadly as your enemies. Only a perfect blend of logic and skill will get you past the deadly obstacles that lie in wait. 20TH ANNIVERSARY EDITION ESPECIALLY DESIGNED FOR CONSOLE * Remastered presentation: a joint effort between visionary game-designer Eric Chahi and developer Martial Hesse Dreville, Another World is back in its 20th Anniversary Edition with High Definition graphics faithful to the original design. * 3 difficulty modes, Normal (easier than original game), Difficult (Equal to original game) and Hardcore (more difficult than original game). * Choose between 100% remastered Sounds/FX, Original Sound and Original CD in-game soundtrack. * Switch between Original/HD graphics.

NO.name: Another World - 20th Anniversary Edition
NO.description: Also known as Out Of This World™ and released across more than a dozen platforms since its 1991 debut, Another World™ has attained cult status among critics and sophisticated gamers alike for its cinematic effects in the graphics, sound and cut scenes. NL.name: Another World - 20th Anniversary Edition
NL.description: Another World™, ook wel bekend als Out Of This World™, is een pionier uit het actie-/platformgenre dat sinds zijn debuut in 1991 al op meer dan tien systemen is uitgekomen. In de loop der jaren heeft Another World™ een ware cultstatus verworven onder zowel recensenten als gamers. Computer Game Review riep Another World™ uit tot 'hoogst beoordeelde game ooit.' MEESLEPEND AVONTUUR DAT OP EEN UNIEKE MANIER WORDT VERTELD Another World™ vertelt het verhaal van Lester Knight Chaykin, een jonge wetenschapper die door de ruimte en de tijd wordt geslingerd na een mislukt nucleair experiment. 20TH ANNIVERSARY EDITION, SPECIAAL ONTWORPEN VOOR CONSOLES * Geremasterde presentatie: dankzij een samenwerking tussen de vooruitstrevende gamedesigner Eric Chahi en de ontwikkelaar Martial Hesse Dreville is Another World terug met een 20th Anniversary Edition met Full HD-graphics die trouw zijn aan de originele look. * 3 niveaus: MAKKELIJK, NORMAAL en MOEILIJK * Kies uit geremasterde geluiden en effecten/ de originele sound en de originele cd-soundtrack. * Schakel tussen de originele en de Full HD-graphics.

NZ.name: Another World - 20th Anniversary Edition
NZ.description: Also known as Out Of This World™ and released across more than a dozen platforms since its 1991 debut, Another World™ has attained cult status among critics and sophisticated gamers alike for its cinematic effects in the graphics, sound and cut scenes. AN IMMERSIVE ADVENTURE WITH UNIQUE STORYTELLING Another World™ chronicles the story of Lester Knight Chaykin a young scientist hurtled through space and time by a nuclear experiment that goes wrong. In an alien and inhospitable world, you will have to dodge, outwit, and overcome the host of alien monsters, while surviving an environment as deadly as your enemies. PL.name: Another World - 20th Anniversary Edition
PL.description: Also known as Out Of This World™ and released across more than a dozen platforms since its 1991 debut, Another World™ has attained cult status among critics and sophisticated gamers alike for its cinematic effects in the graphics, sound and cut scenes. AN IMMERSIVE ADVENTURE WITH UNIQUE STORYTELLING Another World™ chronicles the story of Lester Knight Chaykin a young scientist hurtled through space and time by a nuclear experiment that goes wrong. In an alien and inhospitable world, you will have to dodge, outwit, and overcome the host of alien monsters, while surviving an environment as deadly as your enemies. Only a perfect blend of logic and skill will get you past the deadly obstacles that lie in wait. 20TH ANNIVERSARY EDITION ESPECIALLY DESIGNED FOR CONSOLE * Remastered presentation: a joint effort between visionary game-designer Eric Chahi and developer Martial Hesse Dreville, Another World is back in its 20th Anniversary Edition with High Definition graphics faithful to the original design. * 3 difficulty modes, Normal (easier than original game), Difficult (Equal to original game) and Hardcore (more difficult than original game). * Choose between 100% remastered Sounds/FX, Original Sound and Original CD in-game soundtrack. * Switch between Original/HD graphics.

PT.name: Another World - 20th Anniversary Edition
PT.description: Também conhecido como Out Of This World™, Another World™ é um dos jogos pioneiros no género da ação / plataformas, tendo sido lançado em várias plataformas desde a sua estreia em 1991. Ao longo do tempo, Another World™ tornou-se um jogo de culto entre a crítica e jogadores sofisticados. A Computer Game Review considera Another World™ o seu jogo melhor pontuado de sempre. UMA AVENTURA IMERSIVA COM UM ESTILO NARRATIVO ÚNICO Another World™ narra a aventura de Lester Knight Chaykin, um jovem cientista é lançado através do tempo-espaço por uma experiência nuclear que correu mal. EDIÇÃO D0 20º ANIVERSÁRIO, CONCEBIDA ESPECIALMENTE PARA CONSOLAS * Apresentação redesenhada: Another World regressa com a sua Edição do 20º Aniversário com gráficos em Full HD, fiéis ao design original, graças ao esforço conjunto entre o visionário designer de jogos Eric Chahi e o programador Martial Hesse Dreville. * 3 níveis de dificuldade: EASY, NORMAL e HARD * Escolhe entre sons e efeitos sonoros remasterizados, os sonos originais e a banda sonora original em CD. * Alterna entre os gráficos originais e gráficos Full HD.

RU.name: Another World - 20th Anniversary Edition
RU.description: Игра Another World™, также известная как Out Of This World™, - это новаторский экшен-платформер, вышедший на более чем десяти платформах начиная с 1991 года. За многие годы игра приобрела культовый статус и среди критиков, и среди взыскательных игроков. Журнал Computer Game Review назвал Another World™ "игрой с наивысшим рейтингом за все время". ВПЕЧАТЛЯЮЩЕЕ ПРИКЛЮЧЕНИЕ С УНИКАЛЬНЫМ СЮЖЕТОМ В Another World™ рассказывается история Лестера Найта Чайкина, молодого ученого, заброшенного в неизвестное место и время в результате неудачно завершившегося научного эксперимента. СПЕЦИАЛЬНОЕ ИЗДАНИЕ В ЧЕСТЬ 20-Й ГОДОВЩИНЫ ИГРЫ ДЛЯ консолей * Благодаря совместным усилиям дальновидного игрового дизайнера Эрика Шайи (Eric Chahi) и разработчика Марсьяля Эсса Древиля (Martial Hesse Dreville) игра Another World возвращается к нам в виде специального издания в честь 20-й годовщины, в котором представлена графика в высоком разрешении, верная оригиналу. * 3 уровня сложности: ЛЕГКИЙ (EASY), НОРМАЛЬНЫЙ (NORMAL) и ВЫСОКИЙ (HARD). * Выбор между тремя вариантами: восстановленные звуки и эффекты, оригинальный звук, оригинальный игровой саундтрек на компакт-диске. * Возможность переключения между оригинальной графикой и графикой в высоком разрешении.
